title: Fresh install on 3 XpSp3 diff. machines same problem (cant even run go.exe version)
body:
by **assembler370**: 
Dont know what it is going on, hand-install zip folder set windows path, same problem
with the Installer. 3 different machines Xp SP3 440BX PIII hardware.

C:\>go version
Exception 0xc000001d 0x1003f 0x0
PC=0x53129c

math.init┬╖1()
        C:/Users/ADMINI~1/AppData/Local/Temp/2/bindist664137607/go/src/pkg/math/
pow10.go:34 +0x1c
math.init()
        C:/Users/ADMINI~1/AppData/Local/Temp/2/bindist664137607/go/src/pkg/math/
unsafe.go:21 +0x3b
strconv.init()
        C:/Users/ADMINI~1/AppData/Local/Temp/2/bindist664137607/go/src/pkg/strco
nv/quote.go:442 +0x41
go/parser.init()
        C:/Users/ADMINI~1/AppData/Local/Temp/2/bindist664137607/go/src/pkg/go/pa
rser/parser.go:2437 +0x4b
main.init()
        C:/Users/ADMINI~1/AppData/Local/Temp/2/bindist664137607/go/src/cmd/go/ve
t.go:37 +0x4b

goroutine 2 [runnable]:
eax     0x0
ebx     0x866080
ecx     0x1127d000
edx     0x55
edi     0x31210000
esi     0x864ba4
ebp     0x1d
esp     0x312616ec
eip     0x53129c
eflags  0x10202
cs      0x1b
fs      0x3b
gs      0x0 

What the hell is going on?
